data.system_settings: iPhone 8 +, iOS 11.2 (Public Beta 6, but technically stable 11.2)
data.expected_result: Time stamp should say Today at 17:45
data.short_description: English UK Shows 12-Hour Format Instead of 24 in iOS
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Discord’s app version 2.1.2 (Stable) - Switch to English UK - Restart app if needed, then observe the time. It should say for example (17:45)
